QuestData.Title: Betrayal of the Guard
QuestData.Description: My boys have gotten in too deep.$b$bThey've given in to whatever dark forces are at work here.$b$bDo not hesitate to do what you need to and put them down. They knew what they were signing up for when they picked the wrong side.
QuestData.CompletionText: I feel no pity for those who gave their humanity for power.
QuestData.RewardText: You did what needed to be done.
